org.gvsig.topology
Interface ITopologyRule

All Superinterfaces:
IPersistence
All Known Subinterfaces:
IOneLyrRule, ITwoLyrRule
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSpatialPredicateTwoLyrRule, AbstractTopologyRule, FMapGeometryMustBeClosed, GeometryMustHaveValidCoordinates, GeometryMustNotHaveFewPoints, IGeometryMustBeClosed, JtsValidRule, LineMustNotHaveDangles, LineMustNotHaveDangles2, LineMustNotHavePseudonodes, LineMustNotSelfIntersect, LyrMustBeContainedByOneGeometry, LyrMustBeCoveredByLyr, LyrMustBeCoveredByOneGeometry, LyrMustBeEqual, LyrMustContainsOneGeometry, LyrMustCoversOneGeometry, LyrMustCrossWith, LyrMustDisjoint, LyrMustNotHaveDuplicated, LyrMustTouch, MultiPolygonMustNotHaveNestedShells, MustBeLargerThanClusterTolerance, MustNotHaveRepeatedPoints, PointsMustNotOverlap, PolygonHolesMustBeInShell, PolygonHolesMustNotBeNested, PolygonMustHaveConnectedInterior, PolygonMustNotHaveDuplicatedRings, PolygonMustNotHaveGaps, PolygonMustNotHaveGapsWithJCS, PolygonMustNotHaveHoles, PolygonMustNotHaveSelfIntersectedRings, PolygonMustNotOverlap, PolygonMustNotOverlapWith, PolygonMustNotSelfIntersect
public interface ITopologyRule
extends IPersistence

A topology rule checks that features' geometry of one or more layers verifies a given spatial condition.

Author:
azabala
